layout.js in ./src/comonents/layout.js

  • css js is used

  • children

    import React from "react"
import { Link } from "gatsby"

const LinkList = props => (
  <li style={{ display: `inline-block`, marginRight: `1rem` }}>
    <Link to={props.to}>{props.children}</Link>
  </li>
)

export default ({ children }) => (
  <div style={{ margin: `3rem auto`, maxWidth: 900, padding: `0 1rem`}}>
    <header style={{ marginBottom: `1.5rem`}}>
      <Link to="/" style={{ textShadow: `none` , backgroundImage: `none`}}>
        <h3 style={{ display: `inline` }}>FlicSpace</h3>
      </Link>

      <ul style={{ listStyle: `none`, float: `right` }}>
        <LinkList to="/"> Home </LinkList>
        <LinkList to="/about/"> About </LinkList>
        <LinkList to="/about/"> Works </LinkList>
        <LinkList to="/about/"> Portfolio </LinkList>
        <LinkList to="/contact/"> contact </LinkList>
      </ul>
    </header>
    {children}
  </div>
)
